reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 568/05: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE MINISTER
reg_info.reg_name_text: delegation of regulation-making authority to the minister
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 568/05: DELEGATION OF REGULATION-MAKING AUTHORITY TO THE MINISTER
reg_info.act_under: Trust in Real Estate Services Act, 2002

content.content: 1. (1) Subject to subsections (2) and (3), the authority to make regulations relating to the matters described in paragraphs 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 14, 17, 18, 19, 20, 23.1, 24 and 30 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act is delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 568/05, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 258/22, s. 1 (1, 2). (2) The authority to make regulations under paragraph 2 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act that prescribe conditions of registration is not delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 568/05, s. 1 (2). (3) The Minister’s authority to make regulations respecting transitional matters under paragraph 24 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act is limited to those matters which are delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 258/22, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Subject to subsections (2) and (3), the authority to make regulations relating to the matters described in paragraphs 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 14, 17, 18, 19, 20, 23.1, 24 and 30 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act is delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 568/05, s. 1 (1); O. Reg. 258/22, s. 1 (1, 2).

(2) The authority to make regulations under paragraph 2 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act that prescribe conditions of registration is not delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 568/05, s. 1 (2).

(3) The Minister’s authority to make regulations respecting transitional matters under paragraph 24 of subsection 51 (1) of the Act is limited to those matters which are delegated to the Minister. O. Reg. 258/22, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 568/05, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 568/05, s. 2.
